changes: feat: Added new special skill: 'Mage-Spinner'. This skill combines the effects of the Fire-Spinner and Fire-Mage, automatically casting fireballs at nearby obstacles.
feat: Added visual effects for the Mage Spinner, including a fiery glow, embers, and orbiting fireballs.
feat: Added the ability to manually cast fireballs by pressing the skill key ('U') while Mage Spinner is active.
docs: Added the Mage-Spinner keybinding to the keyboard controls in the info panel.
fix: Fixed a critical syntax error in `js/main.js` by correcting the placement of several code blocks.
fix: Fixed multiple `ReferenceError`s across several files by importing necessary constants.
fix: Fixed a bug preventing manual fireballs from being cast during Mage Spinner.
perf: Lowered the energy cost of the Mage Spinner from 100 to 80.
Feature: Enhanced the debug panel's "Unlock all" functionality. The button now unlocks all Armory skills in addition to all Personas, providing a more comprehensive testing tool.
feat: Added a placeholder for the 'Fire Dash' skill in the Armory, making it visible but not yet unlockable.
feat: Mapped the double-tap gesture to the general 'Special Move' action, allowing it to trigger any selected Armory skill.
refactor: Centralized special move logic into a `handleSpecialMove` function in `js/main.js` to streamline keyboard and gesture controls.
feat: Greyed out the emoji and name of locked Personas in the selector to make their unavailability more apparent.
feat: Right-justified the lock/unlock icon for Personas in the selector.
feat: The lock/unlock icon is now only displayed for Personas that have unlock conditions.
feat: Updated Persona selector labels to use lock (ðŸ”’) and unlock (ðŸ”“) emojis to clearly indicate the status of each persona.
fix: Resolved a wrapping issue with the Heist Control Panel tabs by adding `flex-wrap` to their container, ensuring they wrap correctly on smaller screens.
feat: Implemented the "Destroy 3 obstacles in a row using only the Ground Pound move" achievement for the Fire Spinner skill.

Added logic to track `consecutiveGroundPounds` in `state.playerStats`, incrementing on successful Ground Pound destruction and resetting on other collisions, missed obstacles, or other destructive moves.
Ensured `consecutiveGroundPounds` is correctly saved, loaded, and reset with the game state.
Added a console notification when an Armory achievement is met.
feat: Implemented the ability to select and unselect unlocked special skills from the Armory.
The 'K' key now dynamically triggers the currently selected Armory skill, or reverts to the default Fire Mage action if no skill is selected.
Added UI elements (Select/Unselect buttons) to the Armory tab for managing active skills.
Ensured the selected active skill persists across game sessions via `localStorage`.
Added a sanity check on application load to deselect any `activeArmorySkill` that is no longer unlocked, preventing inconsistent game states.
fix: Fixed a `ReferenceError` in `js/main.js` related to module scope for event handlers.
fix: Restored missing control panel event listeners in `js/main.js` that were inadvertently removed during a previous fix, resolving UI unresponsiveness.
fix: Ensured `activeArmorySkill` is reset to `null` when the game state is reset.
